pages.text: Forest Elves are an ancient race deeply connected to the worldâ€™s natural magic. Gifted archers with an inherent speed in movement, they draw power from the earth itself. They thrive in harmony with the forests, living off the land and respecting the delicate balance of nature.

While they excel in ranged combat, their physical strength and resilience are weaker compared to other races, and they tend to have lower health. The Forest Elves' wisdom in nature and magic is unmatched, and they defend their sacred woods fiercely.
